text: Ne Nyasaye alinende tsifunguo tsia akefisile, abulawo watsimanya halali ye, Ne yamanya akali khulukongo nende munyanza, ne lisafu liosi liosi shilikhwitsanga tawe halali namanyile, nohomba inyuma mushiilima shieliloba, nohomba sishikwitsanga eshiamatsimatsi nohomba eshiumu halali shili mushitabu eshiretsanga habulafu buli likhuwa
